content.title: Start with the customer experience and work backwards to the technology
content.author: Steve Jobs
content.quote_text: You've gotta start with the customer experience and work backwards to the technology.

generation.prompt: Christopher Nolan style cinematic realism with practical effects aesthetic, dramatic architectural perspectives emphasizing scale and geometry, high-contrast naturalistic lighting with deep shadows, wide-angle establishing shots showing spatial relationships, visual metaphors for time and space through environmental design, IMAX-quality photographic clarity. Capturing the vibe of clarity, inspiration. square composition, centered focus, 1:1 aspect ratio
